articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and S7+ get One UI 4 stable update in Europe - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Samsung started to roll out Android 12-based One UI 4 stable updates for the Galaxy Tab S7 and Galaxy Tab S7+ in Europe.
articles.content: We can pretty much affirm that Samsung is now among the fastest brands rolling Android 12 for its smartphones. The company started its beta program shortly after the Android 12 announcement and is al… [+2408 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19: US reports record infections as Omicron cases soar in Europe - The Irish Times
articles.description: Governments across continent consider new restrictions to deal with Omicron surge
articles.content:
France has registered a national and European record for new coronavirus infections as the Omicron variant fuels a surge in cases across the continent, with multiple countries hitting new highs.
